actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the expansion of the Antietam National Battlefield Site in the State of Maryland.

summary.text: Provides for the expansion of the Antietam National Battlefield Site in the State of Maryland. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to identify and acquire lands which comprised the Antietam Battlefield site. Establishes an Antietam National Battlefield Park Advisory Commission to assist the Secretary in developing policies and programs pursuant to this Act. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the expansion of the Antietam National Battlefield Site in the State of Maryland.
